response.overview: Lisi walks through the old bazaar streets with his father,who is distracted by a phone call.Drawn by curiosity,he stops at a toy stand filled with shelves of various toys.Among cars and robots,he searches for something that feels right,yet remains uncertain.His attention drifts toward a doll that stirs an unfamiliar but powerful emotion within him,one he cannot yet understand.Years later,fragments of this unspoken childhood experience continue to echo in Lisi’s life.
response.title: Për Djalin Që Isha
